about_the_game:
"Dead Sale" is an episodic horror game that features different stories. In each episode, players must find a way to escape various locations, mainly houses and properties that are up for sale. However, each of these places has been the site of disturbing, dark, and human events.

Main Mechanic:

Use a mysterious mirror to reveal what has been hidden.

Immersive Atmosphere:

Experience a unique aesthetic, with sepia tones that draw you into the dark depths of this game.

Dark Backstory:

With a deeply disturbing story, uncover the origin of the terrifying events.

Multiple Endings:

Discover different ways to escape the house, though some may not be as lucky as others.

Key Features:

  • Voice acting

  • Sepia tone aesthetic

  • Fast-paced gameplay

  • Photorealistic graphics

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts acts of violence within a dysfunctional family, culminating in a man violently murdering four of his family members, including his wife, two daughters, and mother-in-law.

name: Dead Sale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100u / AMD Ryzen 3 2200g
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 620 or Radeon Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500 / AMD Ryzer 5 3600g
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeFroce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Temas sensíveis

short_description: You are Marcus, an appraiser exploring a house for sale. Power outages reveal a dark entity hunting you. With the help of a mirror, uncover what’s hidden and escape before both time and the shadow claim your life. Realistic graphics, unique dialogues, and a fast gameplay loop. Horror genre
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
